channel.title: FAQ & Help! - All your Questions answered Here!
channel.description:
Status: [glow=green,2,300]Online![/glow]
[b][i]Hello, Welcome to my FAQ and Help Thread. I can answer pretty much any question, I have a server and almost 300 pots, so I know what i'm talking about. Please Check through the FAQ before posting your Problem, because your question is probably here! If some of these have already been posted, I will gladly give Credits if proof and a link is provided.[/b]
[size=20pt]-FAQ's-[/size] Q1: How can I spawn monsters/when I spawn monsters they have 0 hp. A1: You can only spawn monsters if you are the owner or an administrator (gold crown), to make them have more HP, you must edit the NPC.java file.
Q2: How do I make my server run? A2: You must first compile to make sure there is no errors, once done with that click 'Runserver' to run your server!
Q3: On Every server I go to, they all say 'Error Connecting to server, must be down" how do I fix that? A3: That is not something you can fix, it simply means that the owner of the server doesn't have his server up
Q4: What Servers are online? A4: To see what servers are online, go to moparisthebest.com > Server Status page, OR check the Advertisements Section.
Q5: How Do I make my own server? A5: Check out [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,37596.0.html]Mod Taharok's Ultimate Server Guide[/url] or the [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,46384.0.html]Hamachi and No-ip Guide[/url] at the top of this section to make your own Server.
Q6: When I go to moparisthebest.com all I get is a Red "X" in the top left-hand corner! A6: You must download [url=http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp]Java JDK 6.[/url]
Q7: How Can I make myself a Mod? A7: Please use this Tutorial [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49682.0.html] Making mods [/url]
Q8: Where can I download TestScape? A8: You can download TestScape [url=http://rapidshare.de/files/24522895/TestScape_Source.rar.html]Here.[/url]
Q9: When I try to log in, it says invalid username or pass, what do I do? A9: No big problem, it just means that someone is already using that name
Q10: How Do I portforward? A10: Please use the 1st Chapter in the guide found [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,37596.0.html]here[/url]
Q11: When I compile it says Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details A11: That is supossed to happen, it just means you can't override RuneScape's API
Q12: When I compile it says 'Java' is not reconized as an internal or external command, what do I do? A12: Download java JDK 6 [url=http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp]Java JDK 6 Here.[/url] [b]Credits: MrQuarter[/b]
Q13: When I compile it says 'Javac' is not reconized as an internal or external operable batch file A13: This is the most common error, Open compile.bat with notepad and replace 'Javac' with this: Note: Just the LINE! NOT the Whole thing! [code] "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe"[/code] Change to '08' to whatever Java JDK version you've got. To check your JDK Version, go to C:\Program Files\Java and look at the number after jdk.1.5.0_. [b]Credits: ZeroFreeze[/b]
[i][b]More to come soon. Post if you need help!
-Imlostru[/b][/i]

item.title: FAQ & Help! - All your Questions answered Here!
item.dc:creator: @Imlostru Imlostru
item.description:
@Imlostru wrote:

Ok another easy Tut.

Difficulty: 3

Now all done in client so open that up.

Under public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

Paste:

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@yel@Zozumascape!", 6570); sendFrame126("@gre@Players Online: " + players, 6572); SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("MMM dd hh:mm"); String date = sdf.format(new Date()); sendFrame126("@red@" + date, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); }

Then go to the dreadfull public boolean process

And under it add:

		writePlayers();

Your done.

Credits: lawl

S+C+R.

there you go

Read full topic

item.title: FAQ & Help! - All your Questions answered Here!
item.dc:creator: @Imlostru Imlostru
item.description:
@Imlostru wrote:

Status: [glow=green,2,300]Online![/glow]

[i]Hello, Welcome to my FAQ and Help Thread. I can answer pretty much any question, I have a server and almost 300 pots, so I know what i’m talking about. Please Check through the FAQ before posting your Problem, because your question is probably here! If some of these have already been posted, I will gladly give Credits if proof and a link is provided.

                                                                                               [size=20pt]-FAQ's-[/size]

Q1: How can I spawn monsters/when I spawn monsters they have 0 hp.
A1: You can only spawn monsters if you are the owner or an administrator (gold crown), to make them have more HP, you must edit the NPC.java file.

Q2: How do I make my server run?
A2: You must first compile to make sure there is no errors, once done with that click ‘Runserver’ to run your server!

Q3: On Every server I go to, they all say 'Error Connecting to server, must be down" how do I fix that?
A3: That is not something you can fix, it simply means that the owner of the server doesn’t have his server up

Q4: What Servers are online?
A4: To see what servers are online, go to moparisthebest.com > Server Status page, OR check the Advertisements Section.

Q5: How Do I make my own server?
A5: Check out Mod Taharok’s Ultimate Server Guide or the Hamachi and No-ip Guide at the top of this section to make your own Server.

Q6: When I go to moparisthebest.com all I get is a Red “X” in the top left-hand corner!
A6: You must download Java JDK 6.

Q7: How Can I make myself a Mod?
A7: Please use this Tutorial Making mods

Q8: Where can I download TestScape?
A8: You can download TestScape Here.

Q9: When I try to log in, it says invalid username or pass, what do I do?
A9: No big problem, it just means that someone is already using that name

Q10: How Do I portforward?
A10: Please use the 1st Chapter in the guide found here

Q11: When I compile it says
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details
A11: That is supossed to happen, it just means you can’t override RuneScape’s API

Q12: When I compile it says ‘Java’ is not reconized as an internal or external command, what do I do?
A12: Download java JDK 6 Java JDK 6 Here.
Credits: MrQuarter

Q13: When I compile it says ‘Javac’ is not reconized as an internal or external operable batch file
A13: This is the most common error, Open compile.bat with notepad and replace ‘Javac’ with this: Note: Just the LINE! NOT the Whole thing!

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe"
Change to ‘08’ to whatever Java JDK version you’ve got. To check your JDK Version, go to C:\Program Files\Java and look at the number after jdk.1.5.0_.
Credits: ZeroFreeze

[i][b]More to come soon. Post if you need help!

-Imlostru[/b][/i]

Read full topic
